task.title: Running for the First Time
task.shortdesc: Start the development servers and access the application.

info.codeblock: cd backend venv\Scripts\activate python manage.py runserver

step.stepresult: The Django server starts on http://localhost:8000

step.cmd: In a new terminal, start the frontend:
step.stepresult: The Vite dev server starts on http://localhost:5173

step.cmd: In a new terminal, start the Whisper transcription service:

info.codeblock: cd whisper uv run uvicorn whisper_api:app --reload --port 8001

step.stepresult: The Whisper API starts on http://localhost:8001

step.cmd: In a new terminal, start the Huey task queue consumer:

info.codeblock: cd whisper uv run huey_consumer tasks.huey

step.stepresult: The task queue is now processing transcription jobs.

step.cmd: Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173

result.p: You should see the Lingua Workbench home page. Register an account to get started, then you can start uploading audio and creating slices.
